name: Rivelon (AzrayeL)
description:
RIVELON

The tranquil island of Rivelon is a peaceful place for Zahri and friends to learn their trades and enjoy days basking in the warm sun.  Learn the secrets of Aklhema, gathering resources and crafting new items through Alkhemic synthesis.

NB: you can use the Special skill THINK to recall what could be done next and remember what day it is~
